content: **knitted top in drops belle the piece is worked bottom up with v-neck sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no vs-094 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200-200-250-250-300 g colour 21 almond rose needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
